comment: After installing the app doesn't show up on the phone. One has to go thru the watch to open the app on the phone to change any settings. Also the weather data wind speed shown incorrect, like the actual wind is known to be approx 9 kts it shows 41 kts on the watch face.

author: Tristan VonWolfenhasen
comment: It's a good concept but weather and wind speed are definitely wrong email me when you fix problems I'll 're buy it but asking I get a refund atm for it not working correctly

author: Christian Taylor
comment: Great until it completely stopped working

author: Dreams Angel
comment: After temperature shown hundreds of Celsius for sometimes, now it stops not  display temp anymore. Graphics is not crisp but acceptable. 3 timezones is very useful to me anyway.

author: Jon F
comment: Great watch face, but sadly all my watch face from this developer now show stupid weather temperatures.  It is telling me it is currently 278 celsius. Last time I checked I was on  earth, not Mercury.

author: Phil Czajkowski
comment: weather temps totally useless. Nothing in the app shows were the temps are coming from.

author: Gary Benmoshe
comment: Great face terrible battery life

author: Junjun Rivera
comment: It look's really nice but I notice that it drains the battery fast (LG watch Urbane 2nd edition)
title: Battery Issue

author: Paul Howard
comment: Everything is on this watch at a glance no need for a lot of apps to go to for info.  When people see it blows their mind
title: Brilliant

author: Neil Young
comment: What would make this cool is the option the black out the grey sections on the watch face
title: Copl

author: Scott Graham
comment: It won't stay connected to my g watch r.  Latest version on phone and watch. Unfortunately f08 for round wear has stopped, wtf? Stay away from this face until developer fixes... Don't waste your money.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
If you have a problem with that, We'd like to improve.Please give us your situation more in detail.
So, please feel free to contact our mail address.

Thank you.

title: Crashed on g watch r.

author: Reinhold Schöb
comment: But extremely high battery consumption.
title: Excellent watch face

author: Ugonna Nwosu
comment: Looks great!

author: Lee Jinwoo
comment: I cannot use this in urbane 2nd edition. Please fix the problem

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Would you please check the latest version?

We released the update for LG Watch Urbane 2nd edition.
If you have a question ,please feel free to contact our email.
We can give you a help.

Thank you.

title: Fix need in urbane 2

author: Howard Bamber
comment: Would not like to try it on the girls size Huawei but a large moto and its ok. Could do with less flash and more design
title: Good watch

author: Mason Malave
comment: Does this work for the LG g watch
title: Question

author: Paul D Hinds
comment: This watch face has a lot of information in it, however one of the simplest pieces it should have is missing: current weather - it has forecasted Temps, but not current. Also, no setting to only display current time zone and one other. Very cool watch face, and however it is a swing and a miss.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Current weather is the first weather of 3.
Displayed '6PM' means 3PM to 6PM.
And you can set your favorite timezone by setting screen of F08.
For additional question, please feel free to contact our email address.We can give you a help.
Thank you.

title: No Current Weather and Forced Three Time Zones

author: Lee White
comment: Ever since the last update the watch face will not stay connected. It keeps coming up and saying it stopped. I have Uninstaller and reinstalled several times and it still does it. Also the weather will not connect now. Now nothing will connect, no weather bluetooth nothing. I have unpaired my lg g watch r and reset it and still nothing.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I've improved it and updated.Would you please check.Thanks.

title: Great design bad battery

author: Joe Lavinas
comment: Love this watch,  but would really love an option of black and white,  the colors are OK but still prefer black and white option.  Have used it now for 24hours and man does it kill the battery.  I think that if we had the option of black and white it would not drain the battery so fast.

author: Matt Wells
comment: I've tried a few different things but this face no matter what lasts about 5 hours and kills my watch. I absolutely love the face itself. However even setting to the least frequent update intervals kills my watch midday. I would love to know what secret sauce makes this face work
title: I hate to love this face gggrr

comment: Much better. To be fair i think it may have been somthing else draining the bat. Apologies:)

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I've improved it and updated.Would you please check.Thanks.

title: Good looking but

author: Skuli Thorvardarson
comment: Great wear face as always
title: Excellent multi timezone face

author: Andy Mac
comment: Extremely poor selection of the cities. Not every time zone is presented with at least 1 (e.g. UTC+6 is just not there at all). Out of 3 cities I need (São Paulo, Kyiv and Phnom Penh) only the first one was there. Had to get a refund, which is a pity, because I liked the design.

author: Tyson
comment: Set one of the locations to South Africa, and since the app started crashing one way, so thankfully I was able to refund, fix your app please.
title: Crashed on my GwatchR

author: Donald Chapman
comment: Looked great on my LG G Watch R, however, it only worked for 30-seconds then crashed and wouldn't work again.  Needs more work.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Would you please give us more information about your situation.
I'd like to improve.Please feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

author: Kjell J
comment: Too much information on the screen for such a small screen. Watch worked great and if you don't mind a lot of info this is for you.
title: Too much
